title: How to write a letter to a department asking about a position becoming available - Quora

response.answer_text: THIS IS A MODEL, AN OUTLINE. YOU MUST CUSTOMIZE IT TO MAKE IT YOUR OWN. Dear sir, Thank you for your time. You probably can remember when you inquired about job openings in your chosen career. My name is ___________ and I am most interested in working for you in the ______ department. As a student at _________ with a _____________ major, I focused on this area and I did my thesis (or related course work) on this subject. In addition to my studies, I also have numerous experiences in this area. ((Go into some of your work experience, and summarize an interesting related experience.) ((MENTION SOME DETAIL IN THE COMPANY THAT YOU WOULD LIKE TO WORK WITH, PERHAPS IMPROVE)) I believe my enthusiasm, knowledge, loyalty and appetite for hard work would make me a valuable employee. Thank you for your time. I look forward to hearing from you.
